description:
The Straw Hats continue preparations for their voyage to the New World as Robin heads for a meeting with the Revolutionary Dragon, Usopp aspires to become King of the Snipers, and Zoro begs his mortal enemy to train him!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: !سأصير أقوى وأقوى بكثير! عهد زورو لقبطانه!
I Will Get Much, Much Stronger! Zoro`s Pledge to His Captain!
Je deviendrai encore plus fort. La promesse de Zoro envers son capitaine
Madamada Tsuyoku Naru! Zoro Senchou e no Chikai
まだまだ強くなる! ゾロ船長への誓い
